channel.title: Perenthium 639 ~Back~ ~need coders/Beta Testers~
channel.description:
OK Guys i am making a server i want to Host Sometime soon (will not be released)~so dont ask~ uhm all i want to do is add in a few things such as full stairs/doors/ladders... i am really good at this but i also am going to make it atleast 80% like runescape...
Guys i am in desperate need of someone who knows how to add 100% summoning
coders: (i need someone who knows how to add summoning), i also have other things that need to be done.... 0/2 Beta Testers: 0/10 Website designer: ~ i prefer them to use 000webhost or x10hosting i have a website setup i want you to use. 0/1 http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TASdp1Rn_Uo http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Uf_YwaxOVnA http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vc-6kp-2KH4
My Goals: All doors/ladders/stairs All npc Combat 100% and all 100% :/ prob will only get 80% all spells working NO custom shops... just want shop's like on rs/would like to start on the Grand Exchange... all special items ingame will be looted by killin the correct npc for that item... 100% eco items price just a lil bit higher than rs depending on the item ~ set items to reasonable price ~
video is almost done will be adding pics of shops soon.
Now For Applications: (i am only giving 1 mod position away and you have to be highly experienced.... ~expectations are high~)
Beta Tester: Name: Age: ~telling me you have been moderator on another server does not cut it..... if you really are experienced you'd know what i mean... Experience: Proof of Experience: E-Mail: Another Way I can contact you besides E-Mail/Mopar:
Coder: Applying for: Age: Experience: Proof of your experience: E-Mail: What time zone are you in: When are you available:
there is a lot of bug's in this server like when the server dc's and your in a duel screen or in a trade you dont get items back....simple bugs i want to fix but i believe if i can get the right people and a fair amount of people this will be an amazing server.
Updates: almost added full nex stages working 90%...... pictures and video's will be uploaded soon. also i need a hoster for the next 2 weeks. one i can send files to over teamviewer to add into my server for updates......
so can someone please apply for a temp hoster? thank you
